ai-patthana21.41:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.41:0.3_0: for one who wraps over what is called to belief.
ai-patthana21.41:1.1_0: Not for the sake of this is not the cause, nor for the sake of resistance, because of troublesomeness, for the sake of repulsion, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.41:1.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.41:2.1_0: Not for the sake of this is not visible in this way, and now that gives rise to untroubled, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.41:2.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana21.41:3.1_0: Not for the sake of this is not visible in this way, and now that gives rise to untroubled, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.41:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
